subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester United extended its six-year unbeaten streak at Anfield by defeating Liverpool, 1-0, in an English Premier League match. Carlos Tevez’s goal in the 43rd minute off a corner from Wayne Rooney also sent Liverpool to its second consecutive league defeat after an unbeaten start.
